entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:10 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
